Question: Teladia Co,. Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Teladia Co., Ltd

CES 2024

- Teladia Co., Ltd will be showcasing their latest 8K OLED TV at CES 2024.
- The TV features a 120Hz refresh rate, HDR support, and Dolby Atmos sound.
- It comes with built-in voice control and smart home integration.
- The TV is equipped with HDMI 2.1 ports for seamless connectivity with gaming consoles and other devices.
- It also boasts a sleek, slim design with minimal bezels for an immersive viewing experience.

Teladia Co., Ltd

8K OLED TV at CES 2024

- 120Hz refresh rate
- HDR support
- Dolby Atmos sound
- Built-in voice control and smart home integration
- HDMI 2.1 ports
- Sleek, slim design with minimal bezels
